hey everyone, apparently this went up friday but i didn't notice today -- 2021 depth charts are now available through {nflreadr} with nflreadr::load_depth_charts()! these should be updated similarly to the injury reports in nflreadr. have fun playing around with them! #nflverse https://t.co/25GSW8b5aN
